columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique identifier for the ActiveCampaignSalesman record.

columns.name: CampaignID
columns.description: Identifier of the marketing campaign associated with this salesperson assignment.

columns.name: SalesmanID
columns.description: Internal identifier of the salesman / sales representative assigned to the campaign.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date the assignment record was created (stored as MM/DD/YYYY text in this source).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Primary key: unique address identifier.

columns.name: Line1
columns.description: First line of the address in the native/local language (street and number).

columns.name: Line2
columns.description: Second line of the address (suite, building, or additional details) in the native/local language.

columns.name: Line3
columns.description: Third line of the address (often city, region, postal code) in the native/local language.

columns.name: Line4
columns.description: Fourth line of the address, typically the country name in the native/local language.

columns.name: Longitude
columns.description: Longitude coordinate value for the address (floating point).

columns.name: Latitude
columns.description: Latitude coordinate value for the address (floating point).

columns.name: GeoModelType
columns.description: Indicator of the geocoding model/type used (categorical numeric code).

columns.name: GeoModelVersion
columns.description: Version of the geocoding model that produced the geocode results.

columns.name: GeoModelSearchDate
columns.description: Timestamp when the geocoding lookup/search was performed.

columns.name: GeoModelScore
columns.description: Quality/confidence score returned by the geocoding service (higher is better).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1ID
columns.description: Identifier for the matched primary street from the geocode reference (often empty).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2ID
columns.description: Identifier for the matched secondary street from the geocode reference (often empty).

columns.name: GeoModelLocID
columns.description: Identifier of the matched location/place from the geocode reference.

columns.name: GeoModelZip
columns.description: Postal/ZIP code as returned by the geocoding model (text).

columns.name: CountryID
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the Country table (dbo.Country.ID); identifies the country for the address.

columns.name: GeoModelQueryString
columns.description: Original query string used for geocoding (free-text version of the address used in lookup).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Text
columns.description: Street name text as returned by the geocoder for the primary street (native/local language).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1Num
columns.description: House/building number for the matched primary street (as returned by geocoder).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Text
columns.description: Street name text for a secondary street returned by the geocoder (if present).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2Num
columns.description: House/building number for the matched secondary street from geocoder (if present).

columns.name: GeoModelLocText
columns.description: Location/place text (city, town or locality) as returned by the geocoder in native/local language.

columns.name: GeoModelLongitude
columns.description: Longitude value as returned or normalized by the geocoding model (text field).

columns.name: GeoModelLatitude
columns.description: Latitude value as returned or normalized by the geocoding model (text field).

columns.name: GeoBroaderAreas
columns.description: Concatenated area codes or broader area identifiers returned by the geocoding system.

columns.name: NumericZip
columns.description: Numeric representation of the postal/ZIP code for the address (integer form).

columns.name: GeoModelDistrict
columns.description: District or administrative area as returned by the geocoder (native/local language).

columns.name: GeoModelArea
columns.description: Named area or neighborhood returned by the geocoder (native/local language).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data management key used for matching/merging with other data sets (DM system identifier).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Name of the source table or dataset used by the data management process that produced this address.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character-based key used in the data management/merge process (often empty).

columns.name: GeoModelGC_Type
columns.description: Geocode classification/type code returned by the geocoding system (single-character code).

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1
columns.description: Flag (boolean) indicating whether the user has manually overridden Line1 (true/false).

columns.name: Line1En
columns.description: First line of the address in English or latinized representation (street and number).

columns.name: Line2En
columns.description: Second line of the address in English (suite, building, or additional details).

columns.name: Line3En
columns.description: Third line of the address in English (city, region, postal code).

columns.name: Line4En
columns.description: Fourth line of the address, typically the country name in English.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1TextEn
columns.description: Primary street name returned by the geocoder in English or latinized form.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2TextEn
columns.description: Secondary street name returned by the geocoder in English (if present).

columns.name: GeoModelLocTextEn
columns.description: Location/place text (city or locality) as returned by the geocoder in English.

columns.name: GeoModelDistrictEn
columns.description: District or administrative area returned by geocoder in English.

columns.name: GeoModelAreaEn
columns.description: Named area or neighborhood returned by geocoder in English.

columns.name: UserOverrideLine1En
columns.description: Flag (boolean) indicating whether the user has manually overridden Line1En (true/false).

columns.name: GeoModelStreet1NumEn
columns.description: House/building number for the primary street returned by the geocoder in English.

columns.name: GeoModelStreet2NumEn
columns.description: House/building number for the secondary street returned by the geocoder in English (if present).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the advanced payment policy record (unique identifier).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name/title of the advanced payment policy (used for selection and display).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Longer description or notes that explain the purpose or details of the policy.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the policy record was created.

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User account or system user that created the policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the last modification to the policy record.

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User account or system user that last updated the policy record.

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Percentage value applied by the policy (expressed in percent units). May be null if policy uses fixed amount or formula.

columns.name: Plafon
columns.description: Monetary ceiling (maximum allowed amount) for the policy. Stored as decimal currency (may be null).

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Serialized rule/condition expression (XML/XAML) that defines when the policy applies. Typically contains workflow or rule engine logic.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Indicates whether the policy is active and should be considered by the application.

columns.name: AdvanceAmountCalculator
columns.description: Optional textual or code expression describing how the advance amount should be calculated (e.g., script, formula or reference).

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Optional fixed monetary amount associated with the policy. Stored as decimal currency (may be null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Surrogate primary key for the discount policy (unique identifier).

columns.name: DiscountType
columns.description: Numeric code indicating the discount type or category (application-specific enumeration).

columns.name: Name
columns.description: Human-readable name/title of the discount policy (primary label shown to users).

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Long description explaining the discount policy, business intent and details.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag that indicates whether the discount policy is active and should be evaluated.

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Date and time when the discount policy was created (may be null for legacy records).

columns.name: CreatedBy
columns.description: User account that created the discount policy (may be null).

columns.name: ModifiedOn
columns.description: Date and time of the last modification to the discount policy (may be null).

columns.name: ModifiedBy
columns.description: User account that last modified the discount policy (may be null).

columns.name: Percentage
columns.description: Discount percentage applied by the policy. May be null if amount- or rule-based.

columns.name: Amount
columns.description: Fixed discount amount configured by the policy (currency). May be null if percentage-based or rule-driven.

columns.name: RuleExpression
columns.description: Optional serialized expression or rule that determines when and how the discount applies (free text or XML).

columns.name: ApplyToUnit
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the discount should be applied per unit (True) or to the overall line/transaction (False).

columns.name: Bundle1Discount
columns.description: Discount percentage or code for bundle size 1 (may be null).

columns.name: Bundle2Discount
columns.description: Discount percentage or code for bundle size 2 (may be null).

columns.name: Bundle3Discount
columns.description: Discount percentage or code for bundle size 3 (may be null).

columns.name: Bundle4Discount
columns.description: Discount percentage or code for bundle size 4 (may be null).

columns.name: BundleOtherDiscount
columns.description: Discount for other bundle sizes not specifically enumerated (may be null).

columns.name: MaxApplicableDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage that can be applied automatically by the system for this policy (may be null).

columns.name: MaxSupervisorDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage a supervisor can approve for this policy (may be null).

columns.name: MaxAreaManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage an area manager can approve for this policy (may be null).

columns.name: MaxSalesManagerDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage a sales manager can approve for this policy (may be null).

columns.name: MaxSalesmanDiscount
columns.description: Maximum discount percentage a salesperson can apply (may be null).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Data Mart surrogate key used for analytics or downstream reporting (often null).

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Reference to the data mart table name used for analytics (often null).

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Character-based key used for reporting or data-mart joins (often null).

columns.name: Product1Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 1 (may be null).

columns.name: Product2Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 2 (may be null).

columns.name: Product3Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 3 (may be null).

columns.name: Product4Discount
columns.description: Product-specific discount for product slot 4 (may be null).

columns.name: ProductOtherDiscount
columns.description: Product-specific discount applied to other/unlisted products (may be null).

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the advertisement deactivation reason.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable description (Greek) explaining why an advertisement was deactivated.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique numeric identifier for the advertisement sales type.

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Short code or descriptive name for the sales type (stored with Greek collation).

columns.name: DMKey
columns.description: Optional integer key referencing a record in an external data mart or legacy system; often null in this dataset.

columns.name: DMTable
columns.description: Optional name of the external data mart table associated with DMKey; typically null in this dataset.

columns.name: DMCharKey
columns.description: Optional character key used to link to external systems or data marts; frequently null.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the archived number record.

columns.name: Code
columns.description: Numeric code value assigned to the archived number; chosen as the primary human-readable label.

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the archived number is active (True) or inactive (False).

columns.name: CreatedOn
columns.description: Timestamp when the archived number record was created.

columns.name: CreateById
columns.description: Identifier of the user who created the record; foreign key reference to dbo.User.ID.

columns.name: CreateByUser
columns.description: Username of the user who created the archived number (human-friendly creator name).

columns.name: AttributeId
columns.description: Identifier for the attribute group or definition (stored as text).

columns.name: AttributeType
columns.description: Code that categorizes the attribute (e.g., lookup/type code).

columns.name: AttributeName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the attribute; may be localized and is the primary label for this repository entry.

columns.name: AttributeLanguageId
columns.description: Language identifier for the attribute name (e.g., locale code indicating the language of AttributeName).

columns.name: AttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier for a specific attribute value (string-coded id for the value).

columns.name: AttributeValue
columns.description: Localized text value or label for the attribute value (detailed, human-readable content).

columns.name: AttributeValueLanguageId
columns.description: Language identifier for the AttributeValue (indicates localization of the value text).

columns.name: ActiveUdacPartDefinitionCodes
columns.description: Comma-separated list of UDAC part definition codes where this attribute value is active; may be 'None' or null when not restricted.

columns.name: RuleConditionDefinitionID
columns.description: Identifier of the rule condition definition (references dbo.RuleConditionDefinition.ID)

columns.name: RuleConditionOperandID
columns.description: Identifier of the operand available for the rule condition (references dbo.RuleConditionOperand.ID)

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the bank

columns.name: Description
columns.description: Human-readable bank name or description (may include localized text)

columns.name: IsActive
columns.description: Flag indicating whether the bank is active (True = active, False = inactive)

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier for the migration activity or step to which this attribute mapping applies; groups mappings by migration activity.

columns.name: OldAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the source (old) attribute being mapped; represents the attribute value in the legacy system.

columns.name: NewAttributeID
columns.description: Identifier of the target (new) attribute in the destination system to which the old attribute is mapped.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Optional identifier of the migration activity or step; when present, the value mapping is scoped to this activity.

columns.name: OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the source (old) attribute value that is being mapped; unique key for this mapping record.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the target (new) attribute value in the destination system that corresponds to the old attribute value.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier for the activity to which the keyword mapping applies; part of the composite primary key and typically references an Activity record.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier for the source keyword being mapped; part of the composite primary key and typically references a Keyword entity.

columns.name: NewAttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the new attribute value assigned for this keyword mapping; part of the composite primary key and represents the target/new value after migration.

columns.name: SourceID
columns.description: Identifier of the source record that is being merged; part of the composite primary key and typically maps to the original record before merge.

columns.name: TargetID
columns.description: Identifier of the target record that receives merged data; part of the composite primary key and usually represents the surviving record after merge.

columns.name: Initial_OldAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the original attribute value that will be replaced. Typically references the attribute value master/entity in the source system.

columns.name: ReplaceWithAttributeValueId
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value that should replace the original value. Typically references the attribute value master/entity in the target or updated mapping.

columns.name: KeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the original keyword that is being replaced. References the keyword master/entity in the originating dataset.

columns.name: ReplaceWithKeywordID
columns.description: Identifier of the keyword that should replace the original keyword. References the keyword master/entity used after migration or normalization.

columns.name: ActivityID
columns.description: Identifier of the activity. Part of the composite primary key linking this record to an activity (acts like a foreign reference to an activity entity). Integer values drawn from the activity domain.

columns.name: AttributeValueID
columns.description: Identifier of the attribute value associated with the activity. Second column of the composite primary key; represents a specific attribute value applied to the activity.

columns.name: Activity_ID
columns.description: Unique identifier for the activity. Serves as the primary key for the activity record and is used to join localized names to the activity.

columns.name: NameGr
columns.description: Greek-language name for the activity (NVARCHAR, Greek collation). Human-readable label in Greek for display and searching in Greek-language contexts.

columns.name: NameEn
columns.description: English-language name for the activity. Preferred human-readable label for UI display and default search/sort in English contexts.

attributes.name: GeoAreaId
attributes.description: Stable identifier for the geographic area (source key).

attributes.name: Name_
attributes.description: Primary (nominative) name of the geographic area in Greek.

attributes.name: Name_
attributes.description: Alternative (genitive) form of the geographic area name (often empty in this dataset).

attributes.name: specifiers
attributes.description: Additional qualifiers or disambiguation text for the area (e.g., district, neighborhood).

attributes.name: Concatenate Name
attributes.description: Pre-built human-friendly combined name used for display (concatenation of name fields/specifiers).

attributes.name: ID
attributes.description: Surrogate integer key for the calendar row.

attributes.name: CalendarDate
attributes.description: Full calendar date (datetime) for the calendar entry.

attributes.name: Year
attributes.description: Calendar year derived from CalendarDate.

attributes.name: MonthName
attributes.description: Month name (e.g., January, ) derived from CalendarDate; suitable for month-level grouping.

attributes.name: DayOfWeek
attributes.description: Name of the day of week derived from CalendarDate (e.g., Monday).

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Optional textual description for the date (e.g., holiday or special event), in Greek where available.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the attribute value (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Label of the star rating in English (e.g., '1 star', '2 stars').

attributes.name: Stars
attributes.description: Numeric star count (1-5) extracted from AttributeValue for numeric analysis and sorting.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the attribute value (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Label of the star rating in Greek (e.g., '1 ', '2 ').

attributes.name: Stars
attributes.description: Numeric star count (1-5) extracted from AttributeValue for numeric analysis and sorting.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate/string identifier for the transaction type value

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Transaction type label in Greek (e.g.,  ,  , Online )

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: String identifier for the unit/accommodation type

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Accommodation/unit type label in English (e.g., Hotel, Hotel Boutique, Resort-Club)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the unit type (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Unit type name/description in Greek (e.g., oo, oo Boutique).

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the functional month (string).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: English month name indicating functional month (sample values like 'June||', 'July||').

attributes.name: MonthNumber
attributes.description: Numeric identifier for the functional month (stored as text). Values range across 12 distinct month identifiers.

attributes.name: MonthName
attributes.description: Month name in Greek (sample values show Greek month names). Some values include trailing delimiters '||' in the source.

attributes.name: PaymentMethodId
attributes.description: Internal identifier for the payment method (stored as text).

attributes.name: PaymentMethod
attributes.description: Payment method description in English (examples: 'By credit card Visa', 'By deposit on bank account'). Source values may include trailing delimiters '||'.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier / code for the payment method (string key stored as NVARCHAR).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Human-readable payment method description in Greek (examples: Visa, Mastercard, Amex, cash descriptions).

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier / code for the room-keys attribute (string key stored as NVARCHAR).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Number of keys for the room expressed as text (e.g. '1 key', '2 keys'). Stored as NVARCHAR; semantic meaning is a small integer count of keys.

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the room keys attribute value (string-coded id)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Label for number of room keys in Greek (e.g. '1 ', '2 ')

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Identifier for the arrival time value (string-coded id)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Arrival time value (formatted as HH:MM), English labels

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate / lookup identifier for the arrival time value (string ID)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Time of day value formatted as HH:MM (24-hour)

attributes.name: Hour
attributes.description: Hour component extracted from AttributeValue (0-23)

attributes.name: Minute
attributes.description: Minute component extracted from AttributeValue (0-59)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate / lookup identifier for the departure time value (string ID)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Time of day value formatted as HH:MM (24-hour)

attributes.name: Hour
attributes.description: Hour component extracted from AttributeValue (0-23)

attributes.name: Minute
attributes.description: Minute component extracted from AttributeValue (0-59)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the departure time attribute (string id from source)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Departure time in HH:MM format (localized Greek view)

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the high-season month attribute (string id from source)

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Name of month indicating high season (English). Source values may include trailing delimiters (e.g., 'January||').

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the attribute value (stored as NVARCHAR).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Month name in Greek (values include a trailing '||' delimiter in the source).

attributes.name: AttributeValueId
attributes.description: Surrogate identifier for the attribute value (stored as NVARCHAR).

attributes.name: AttributeValue
attributes.description: Month name in English (values include a trailing '||' delimiter in the source).

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Sum of payment amounts recorded for the payment method entry. Primary monetary measure for this table.

measures.name: NumberOfPayments
measures.description: Count of payment method records (rows) in the fact table.

measures.name: AveragePaymentAmount
measures.description: Average payment amount per record. Nulls in Amount are excluded by AVG semantics.

measures.name: UniqueSystemReceipts
measures.description: Number of distinct system receipt identifiers referenced by these payment records. SystemReceiptNumber can be null; nulls are excluded.

measures.name: CheckPaymentsCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN CheckNumber IS NOT NULL OR CheckPublisher IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of records that appear to be check payments (identified by presence of CheckNumber or CheckPublisher). Useful for separating check-based flows from other payment types.

measures.name: BankDepositedAmount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BankDepositDate IS NOT NULL THEN Amount ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Sum of amounts for records that have a BankDepositDate (i.e., amounts that were deposited to a bank).

measures.name: PolicyAmountSum
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount values. Note: this column is almost entirely null in the current dataset and should be interpreted as sparse.

measures.name: PercentOfTotalAmount
measures.description: Proportion of the overall table amount represented by the current aggregation context. Implemented using a window denominator (NULL-safe). Useful for charts showing share-of-total.

measures.name: TotalAmount
measures.description: Total payment amount recorded for these payment method rows. Amount stored with three decimal places.

measures.name: PaymentCount
measures.description: Number of payment method records (rows). Use to count payments or payment method entries.

measures.name: AveragePaymentAmount
measures.description: Average payment amount per payment method row.

measures.name: MinPaymentAmount
measures.description: Smallest payment amount observed in the dataset.

measures.name: MaxPaymentAmount
measures.description: Largest payment amount observed in the dataset.

measures.name: DistinctPaymentMethodTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct payment method type identifiers present in the selected set.

measures.name: AverageCreditCardInstallments
measures.description: Average number of installments for credit card payments. Column is sparse (many nulls) so averages should be interpreted accordingly.

measures.name: TotalPolicyAmount
measures.description: Sum of PolicyAmount values associated with payment rows. Field is largely null in the sampled data.

measures.name: DistinctSystemReceiptNumbers
measures.description: Count of distinct system receipt numbers observed (useful for cross-checks with receipt tables). Field appears sparse.

measures.name: RecordCount
measures.description: Number of association records (rows) for the selected filter/context. At the table grain this will typically be 1 per row; useful for aggregations.

measures.name: DistinctSalesCollections
measures.description: Count of distinct sales collections represented in the current filter/context. Useful when aggregating by payment method or other dimensions.

measures.name: DistinctAdvancedPaymentMethods
measures.description: Count of distinct advanced payment methods represented in the current filter/context. Useful when aggregating by sales collection or other dimensions.

measures.name: AdvertisementCount
measures.description: Number of advertisement records (row count)

measures.name: TotalPrice
measures.description: Sum of Price for the advertisement rows. Price is a monetary amount per advertisement.

measures.name: AveragePrice
measures.description: Average Price per advertisement

measures.name: TotalDiscount
measures.description: Sum of advertised discounts (Discount column)

measures.name: TotalRulesDiscount
measures.description: Sum of discounts applied by rules

measures.name: TotalPaymentDiscount
measures.description: Sum of payment-related discounts. Note: high null rate for this column; NULLs are treated as 0 in aggregated business calculations.

measures.name: TotalProductDiscount
measures.description: Sum of product-specific discounts (may be mostly NULL in this dataset)

measures.name: TotalBundleDiscount
measures.description: Sum of bundle discounts

measures.name: TotalAllDiscounts
measures.description: Combined total of all discount types (treats NULL as 0). Useful for net calculations.

measures.name: NetRevenue
measures.description: Estimated net revenue = Price minus all discount types (NULL discounts treated as 0). Use as a proxy for what was billed after discounts.

measures.name: SumAlteredAmount
measures.description: Sum of AlteredAmount (manually adjusted amounts). Column has very high null rate; aggregated value may be sparse.

measures.name: SumBudgetAmount
measures.description: Sum of BudgetAmount. Column is mostly NULL in the sample.

measures.name: SumOneTimeAmount
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts associated with advertisements

measures.name: SumExtraFeeAmount
measures.description: Sum of extra fee amounts

measures.name: SumOneTimeAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Sum of one-time amounts after discounts (mostly NULL in sample)

measures.name: SumExtraFeeAmountAfterDiscount
measures.description: Sum of extra fee amounts after discounts (mostly NULL in sample)

measures.name: SumActualSpentBudget
measures.description: Sum of actual spent budget (sparse in dataset)

measures.name: SumExtraFeeAmountAfterCC
measures.description: Sum of extra fee amounts after cost corrections (sparse)

measures.name: SumAlteredPPCAmountAfterCC
measures.description: Sum of altered PPC amounts after cost corrections (sparse)

measures.name: ActiveAdvertisements
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN DeactivationDate IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Number of advertisements that are not deactivated (DeactivationDate IS NULL)

measures.name: SubscriptionBasedCount
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN IsSubscriptionBased = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of advertisements marked as subscription-based

measures.name: AverageActiveDurationDays
measures.expression: AVG(CASE WHEN AdvEndDate IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(day, AdvBeginDate, AdvEndDate) END)
measures.description: Average duration in days between AdvBeginDate and AdvEndDate for rows with an end date. Note: AdvEndDate is frequently NULL so this average is calculated on a subset.

measures.name: ExtractionCount
measures.description: Total number of extraction events (row count).

measures.name: DistinctMessageCount
measures.description: Number of distinct extraction text messages/templates recorded.

measures.name: EarliestTimeStamp
measures.description: Timestamp of the earliest recorded extraction in the filtered set.

measures.name: LatestTimeStamp
measures.description: Timestamp of the latest recorded extraction in the filtered set.

measures.name: AverageExtractionsPerDay
measures.description: Average number of extraction events per distinct day in the current filter context.

measures.name: Extracts_Type_0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of extraction events with Type = 0. (Interpretation of code depends on source system.)

measures.name: Extracts_Type_1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of extraction events with Type = 1. (Interpretation of code depends on source system.)

measures.name: Extracts_Type_2
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Type = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of extraction events with Type = 2. (Interpretation of code depends on source system.)

measures.name: Extracts_Status_0
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of extraction events with Status = 0. (Interpretation of code depends on source system.)

measures.name: Extracts_Status_1
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of extraction events with Status = 1. (Interpretation of code depends on source system.)

measures.name: Status_0_Rate
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0)
measures.description: Proportion of extraction events where Status = 0 (percentage of total events). Interpret code meaning in source system.

measures.name: Deposit Count
measures.description: Total number of deposit detail records (one row per deposit detail)

measures.name: Distinct Deposit Numbers
measures.description: Number of distinct deposit identifiers recorded in BankDepositNumber

measures.name: Distinct Banks
measures.description: Number of distinct banks referenced by these deposit details

measures.name: Earliest Deposit Date
measures.description: The earliest BankDepositDate in the current filter context

measures.name: Latest Deposit Date
measures.description: The latest BankDepositDate in the current filter context

measures.name: Average Days Since Deposit
measures.description: Average number of days between each deposit date and today (useful to gauge recency)

measures.name: ActionCount
measures.description: Total number of recorded batch actions (rows in this table).

measures.name: DistinctBatchCount
measures.description: Number of distinct batches that have one or more actions recorded.

measures.name: RowsAffected_Total
measures.description: Total number of rows affected by all recorded batch actions (sum of RowsAffected). Null RowsAffected are treated as 0 if present.

measures.name: RowsAffected_Average
measures.description: Average number of rows affected per action.

measures.name: RowsAffected_Max
measures.description: Maximum rows affected by a single action.

measures.name: RowsAffected_Min
measures.description: Minimum rows affected by a single action.

measures.name: SuccessfulActions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions marked with Status = 1 (observed success flag).

measures.name: FailedActions
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions marked with Status = 0 (observed failure/other flag).

measures.name: SuccessRate
measures.expression: CASE WHEN COUNT(ID) = 0 THEN NULL ELSE SUM(CASE WHEN Status = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(ID) END
measures.description: Share of actions where Status = 1 (Successful actions / total actions).

measures.name: ActionType_1_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BatchActionType = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions with BatchActionType = 1. (Observed values in this column are 0/1.)

measures.name: ActionType_0_Count
measures.expression: SUM(CASE WHEN BatchActionType = 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)
measures.description: Count of actions with BatchActionType = 0. (Observed values in this column are 0/1.)

measures.name: ActionsByType_DistinctTypes
measures.description: Number of distinct Type codes observed for actions (useful to understand how many action subtypes exist).

foreign_keys.note: Logical reference to the Batch dimension/table (not declared in original metadata).
Suggested dimension reference for interpreting BatchActionType codes.
Suggested dimension reference for interpreting Status codes (e.g., success/failure).
Suggested reference for the Type code (observed to have multiple distinct values).

default_filters.note: Example default filter to limit analysis to data from 2012 onward. Adjust to business needs.
